US States Shapefile

Source: R/state_sf.R
state_sf.Rd

Useful sf object shapefile for US States.

state_sf

Format

An object of class sf (inherits from data.frame) with 51 rows and 10 columns.

Examples

data("state_sf")

plot(state_sf$geometry)
